posts.name: Jamie Kyle
posts.cooked:
Hello everyone! The Signal team is releasing a new version of Signal Desktop, v7.50.0-beta.1. If you‚Äôre interested in participating, join the beta here.

Release notes:

  • If you link a new Desktop on Signal Android and choose to transfer your message history, now you can also selectively transfer old attachments from your primary device too. Bring the past into the present by scrolling back in time and clicking on the download icon. As always, the transfer process is end-to-end encrypted and secure.

Commit changes: Comparing v7.49.0-beta.1‚Ä¶v7.50.0-beta.1 ¬∑ signalapp/Signal-Desktop ¬∑ GitHub

New Version: 7.50.0-beta.1

45 new commits since 7.49.0-beta.2:

Show commits

  • v7.50.0-alpha.1 [1]

  • Use prebuilt simple-windows-notifications [2]

  • Fix packaging on Windows with prebuild module [3]

  • New SignalDebug function: archiveSessionsForCurrentConversation [4]

  • Group Send Endorsements: Don't fetch blocked groups [5]

  • Hot socket [6]

  • callStateChange: Properly handle ReceivedOfferWhileActive event [7]

  • Fix incremental video playback when file is downloaded quickly [8]

  • CompositionInput: Run onBackspace no matter the modifiers [9]

  • Update to RingRTC v2.50.3 [10]

  • Improve error messaging for startup database error [11]

  • Attachment backfill [12]

  • Add backfillError to AttachmentType [13]

  • Allow clicking on narrow version of idle primary device warning [14]

  • Bump electron from 35.0.2 to 35.1.0 [15]

  • Allow backfill for more undownloadable attachments [16]

  • Fun picker improvements [17]

  • Fix scheduling of paging queries [18]

  • Highlight components in ICU Book [19]

  • Click to download avatar for unaccepted conversations [20]

  • Fix avatar background aliasing [21]

  • Fix errant gradient on note to self [22]

  • Upgrade axios to 1.8.4 [23]

  • Backfill improvements [24]

  • Fun picker fixes [25]

  • Release notes for 7.49 [26]

  • Update strings [27]

  • Update DNS fallback [28]

  • Improve remote participant rendering performance [29]

  • Parallelize get-strings [30]

  • beforeMessageSend: Properly update last message with active send [31]

  • Expanded local preview: Don't overlap controls when audio-only/reconnecting [32]

  • Bump electron from 35.1.0 to 35.1.2 [33]

  • Fix rendering non/overly-qualified emoji in emojify [34]

  • Show mute icon in 1:1 calls for remote party [35]

  • Fix sticker rendering with bad content-type [36]

  • Use transform: translate for call participants [37]

  • Local preview: Ensure background blur is opaque to items behind it [38]

  • Fix group link wrapping in convo details [39]

  • Fix gradient showing instead of placeholder when Avatar URL loading fails [40]

  • Migrate remaining emoji/sticker pickers to fun picker [41]

  • Fix avatar not showing for new group adds with trusted contact [42]

  • Update release notes [43]

  • Update strings [44]

  • 7.50.0-beta.1 [45]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-Desktop v7.49.0-beta.2‚Ä¶v7.50.0-beta.1

Localization changes

Note: after clicking a link, it may take a few seconds before GitHub jumps to the file (try scrolling a bit if it doesn‚Äôt).

At least 67 languages changed since 7.49.0-beta.2:

For technical reasons, not all languages may be listed below. However, everything from ‚ÄúUpdated language translations‚Äù and similar commits is listed, so the list is likely complete. You can view the full comparison to 7.49.0-beta.2 so far here.

Show changes
  • Afrikaans (af-ZA)
  • Albanian (sq-AL)
